There were no other sightings in Glendale on or around October 22nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watering my back yard when i heard a hellicopter hovering over my house.It appeared to be watching something.I walked out my back gate & up on the canal behind my house to see if I could see what the helicopter was looking at.I didnt see anything,so i walked back in my back yard & then noticed an object in the sky moving in a north easterly direction.I ran inside grabbed my camera & shot 5 pics.The object eventually flew out of site after about 30 seconds.The object appeared a silverish or grayish color.The film in my camera was black & white film, When i got the film developed i could not see anything on the pics.Then my brother noticed the object in question uppon further observation.Id like to send mufon the photo attachments.If you would like me to highlite the object ill do that.
Summary: a helicopter was observing this object,that's what drew my attantion to it.
